Key Match Events: Karl-Anthony Towns had a triple-double with 31 points, 21 rebounds, and 4 assists.
Josh Hart recorded a triple-double with 15 points, 14 rebounds, and 12 assists.
The Knicks started to erupt in the fourth quarter, unleashing an 8-0 run to go up by 16 points.
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks rose to 24-10 in the season.
The Jazz dropped to 7-25 and lost their fifth straight game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks won their ninth straight game.
OG Anunoby had 22 markers for the Knicks.
Collin Sexton and Jordan Clarkson led the Jazz with 25 points apiece.
